about: Coq is a formal proof management system. It provides a formal language to write mathematical definitions, executable algorithms and theorems together with an environment for semi-interactive development of machine-checked proofs.
Lightweight static analysis for many languages. Find bug variants with patterns that look like source code.

Terrateam is an open-source GitOps CI/CD platform for automating infrastructure workflows. It integrates with GitHub to orchestrate Terraform, OpenTofu, CDKTF, Terragrunt, and Pulumi operations via pull requests.
The core OCaml system: compilers, runtime system, base libraries
Mina is a cryptocurrency protocol with a constant size blockchain, improving scaling while maintaining decentralization and security.
A static analyzer for Java, C, C++, and Objective-C
A composable build system for OCaml.
magic-trace collects and displays high-resolution traces of what a process is doing
The Flambda backend project for OCaml
